    • Constructor Detail

      • Z4SinusoidalFiller

        public Z4SinusoidalFiller​(Z4GradientColor gradientColor,
                          int x,
                          int y,
                          double waveLength,
                          double period,
                          double amplitude,
                          double angle,
                          int boundaryBehavior)
        Creates the object
        Parameters:
        gradientColor - The color used to fill
        x - The x-axis coordinate of the start point of the sinusoid
        y - The y-axis coordinate of the start point of the sinusoid
        waveLength - The wave lenght of the sinusoid
        period - The period of the sinusoid
        amplitude - The amplitude of the sinusoid
        angle - The rotation angle of the sinusoid
        boundaryBehavior - The boundary behavior
